data.name: Try to Fly
data.detailed_description:
They say that the trick to flying is to throw yourself on the ground and miss. Well, now you can find out if itâ€™s true! And you donâ€™t even have to risk your own life thanks to our simple and easy to navigate simulation game.

Take on the role of one of nine fearless characters and throw yourself into the unknown, aiming for your target destination. The closer you get, the more coins you gain! ğŸ’°

Use coins to upgrade your character to make the game even more entertaining. Pass next levels to reach new incredible locations - you can jump off of skyscrapers, trains, bridges and volcanos. You can even jump into outer space!ğŸªğŸŒ‹ğŸš€ğŸŒ‰

The higher the level, the more difficult the game gets, but fear not! You can upgrade your power and flying skills to jump even further and beat your records!

And remember, People Can Fly, and let no one tell you otherwise! I mean in our gameâ€¦ and for a momentâ€¦ until you eventually fall. But when you do, just try to hit the finish target. Anyway, have fun, and stay safe!

data.short_description: Pick up your character and perform crazy stunts on multiple locations
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: API DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: API DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
